  • Constructor Details

    • AppointmentService

      public AppointmentService(DoctorService doctorService, PatientService patientService)
      Constructs an AppointmentService with the provided DoctorService and PatientService. Initializes the AppointmentOutcomeRecord and DoctorAvailabilityRepository.
      Parameters:
      doctorService - The service managing doctor-related operations.
      patientService - The service managing patient-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • scheduleAppointment

      public void scheduleAppointment(Patient patient, String doctorId, LocalDateTime dateTime)
      Schedules an appointment for a given patient with a specified doctor and datetime. Validates the inputs, checks availability, and updates necessary records.
      Parameters:
      patient - The patient scheduling the appointment.
      doctorId - The ID of the doctor for the appointment.
      dateTime - The date and time of the appointment.

    • cancelAppointment

      public void cancelAppointment(String appointmentId)
      Cancels an appointment by its ID. Updates the doctor's schedule and appointment status.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to cancel.

    • processAppointment

      public void processAppointment(String appointmentId, boolean accept)
      Processes an appointment by confirming or declining it. Updates the status and adjusts doctor availability accordingly.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to process.
      accept - A boolean indicating whether to confirm (true) or decline (false) the appointment.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      public boolean rescheduleAppointment(String appointmentID, LocalDateTime newDateTime)
      Reschedules an existing appointment to a new datetime. Ensures the new time slot is available and updates the appointment record.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment to reschedule.
      newDateTime - The new date and time for the appointment.
      Returns:
      True if the rescheduling is successful, false otherwise.

    • addConsultationNotes

      public void addConsultationNotes(String appointmentId, String notes)
      Adds consultation notes to a specific appointment. Automatically marks the appointment as completed if both notes and prescriptions are present.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to update.
      notes - The consultation notes to add.

    • getAppointmentById

      public Appointment getAppointmentById(String appointmentId)
      Retrieves an appointment by its ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The unique identifier of the appointment.
      Returns:
      The appointment if found, null otherwise.

    • setTypeOfService

      public void setTypeOfService(String appointmentId, TypeOfService serviceType)
      Sets the type of service for a specific appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to update.
      serviceType - The type of service to set.

    • addPrescription

      public void addPrescription(String appointmentId, Prescription prescription)
      Adds a prescription to a specific appointment. Automatically marks the appointment as completed if both notes and prescriptions are present.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to update.
      prescription - The prescription to add to the appointment.
